article.title: Intelsat Receives Navy Contract for Satellite Communications Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Intelsat General Corporation has been awarded a $6.2 million firm-fixed-price contract for on-orbit Ultra-High-Frequency (UHF) Satellite Communication (SATCOM) services. The contract has a cumulative value of an estimated $35 million. The Space and Naval Warfare Systems Command, San Diego, is the contracting activity.
